languages.text: Whenever the character is attacked by an enemy, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the attacking creature.
languages.original_text: Когда персонажа атакуют, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} в количестве, равном {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангу{/g} атаковавшего противника.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the character is attacked by an enemy, they gain momentum equal to the difficulty type of the attacking creature.

languages.text: Cuando el personaje sufre el ataque de un enemigo, gana {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} igual al {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la criatura atacante.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el personaje sufre el ataque de un enemigo, gana {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} igual al {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la criatura atacante.

languages.text: キャラクターが敵に攻撃された時、攻撃してきた敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character is attacked by an enemy, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the attacking creature.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが敵に攻撃された時、攻撃してきた敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得る。

languages.text: 每当角色遭到敌人攻击时，都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 每当角色遭到敌人攻击时，都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，等同于攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}。

languages.text: Wenn der Charakter von einem Gegner angegriffen wird, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} in Höhe der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der angreifenden Kreatur.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Charakter von einem Gegner angegriffen wird, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} in Höhe der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der angreifenden Kreatur.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi attaque le personnage, celui-ci acquiert une {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} égale au {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la créature ennemie.
